attributes.action: formally recognise and praise the people and town of Wooton Basset in Wiltshire for their outstanding efforts in representing the entire nation when paying respects to our fallen military personnel.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The town of Wooton Basset in Wiltshire and the residents therein have gladdened the hearts of the entire nation with their presence at the roadside when fallen military personnel are returned to the U.K.  Whether rain, shine, wind, snow they are there heads bowed paying their and our respects. Surely there is some method for the nation to thank the town and its residents for their actions, whether in the form of a memorial or even something more practical of benefit to the said community.
